messages.content: I would like a cup of coffee.
{"explanation": "The coffee machine is usually in the kitchen. Go to the kitchen and get coffee.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
Please help me find a pair of scissors.
{"explanation": "Scissors are usually in room 211. Go to room 211 and find a pair of scissors.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
I want to go to room 210.
{"explanation": "Go to room 210.", "positions": [[-30.26, -3.45]]}
Help me pour a glass of water.
{"explanation": "The water cup is usually in the kitchen. Go to the kitchen and pour a glass of water.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
I want to go to the restroom.
{"explanation": "The restroom is usually at -44.31, -0.70. Go to the restroom.", "positions": [[-44.31, -0.7]]}
I need a paper magazine.
{"explanation": "Magazines are usually on the table in the lounge area. Go to the lounge area and find a magazine.", "positions": [[-21.16, 0.65]]}
I want to go to room 205.
{"explanation": "Go to room 205.", "positions": [[-15.69, -4.52]]}
Help me make a copy of a document.
{"explanation": "The printer is in room 203. Go to room 203 and make a copy of the document.", "positions": [[-7.84, -4.8]]}
Help me get a cup of coffee from the lounge area.
{"explanation": "Coffee is usually at the water dispenser in the lounge area. Go to the lounge area and get a cup of coffee.", "positions": [[-21.16, 0.65]]}
Please help me find a brush.
{"explanation": "Brushes are usually in room 211. Go to room 211 and find a brush.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
Go to room 202 and check the status of the drone.
{"explanation": "Go to the drone lab in room 202 to check the status of the drone.", "positions": [[0.68, -3.25]]}
Run to the restroom.
{"explanation": "Go to the restroom in room 200.", "positions": [[-44.31, -0.7]]}
Go to room 205 and find a book.
{"explanation": "Go to the robotics lab in room 205 and find a book.", "positions": [[-15.69, -4.52]]}
Help me find a pair of scissors.
{"explanation": "Scissors are tools and can be found in the tool room in room 211.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
Get me a bowl of noodles.
{"explanation": "Go to the kitchen and get a bowl of noodles.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
Go to room 203 and print a few pages of documents.
{"explanation": "Go to room 203 and use the printer to print the documents.", "positions": [[-7.84, -4.8]]}
Go to room 204 and find a book on programming.
{"explanation": "Go to room 204 where the senior students are and find a book on programming.", "positions": [[-6.39, -3.0]]}
Get me a bottle of cold water.
{"explanation": "Go to the kitchen and get a bottle of cold water.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
Go to room 207 and find a pencil.
{"explanation": "Go to room 207 and find a pencil.", "positions": [[-21.0, -4.71]]}
Get me a bottle of drink.
{"explanation": "Go to the kitchen and get a bottle of drink.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
I need to make a copy of a document and have the copy delivered to me.

{"explanation": "To make a copy of the document, go to room 203 first, then go to room 201 to deliver the copy. Room 203 has a printer, so go there first.", "positions": [[-7.84, -4.8], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
Help me find a ruler.
{"explanation": "A ruler is a tool and belongs to the mechanical tools. Mechanical tools are located in room 211, so you need to go there.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
I want to go to the drone lab.
{"explanation": "To go to the drone lab, go to room 202.", "positions": [[0.68, -3.25]]}
I want to go to the soft robotics lab.
{"explanation": "To go to the soft robotics lab, go to room 205.", "positions": [[-15.69, -4.52]]}
I want to print some documents.
{"explanation": "To print the documents, go to room 203 where the printer is located.", "positions": [[-7.84, -4.8]]}
I need to charge my device.
{"explanation": "To charge your device, go to the lounge area.", "positions": [[-21.16, 0.65]]}
I'm hungry.
{"explanation": "To get food, go to the kitchen.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
I want to find a senior student.
{"explanation": "The senior student is in room 204. You need to go there.", "positions": [[-6.39, -3.0]]}
I want to go to the restroom.
{"explanation": "To go to the restroom, there are two restrooms. One of them is located at -44.31, -0.70. You can go to either one.", "positions": [[-44.31, -0.7]]}
Help me find a hammer.
{"explanation": "A hammer is a tool and belongs to the mechanical tools. Mechanical tools are located in room 211, so you need to go there.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
I want to go to the lounge to rest.
{"explanation": "To rest, go to the lounge area.", "positions": [[-21.16, 0.65]]}
I need to pick up a package.
{"explanation": "Packages are usually delivered to the staircase. You need to go to the staircase.", "positions": [[5.48, 2.91]]}
Please help me find a book about soft robotics.
{"explanation": "A book about soft robotics should be in the soft robotics lab, room 205.", "positions": [[-15.69, -4.52]]}
I want to go to the kitchen to get a cup.
{"explanation": "Cups are kitchen utensils and are located in the kitchen. You need to go there.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
Please help me find a hammer.
{"explanation": "A hammer is a tool and belongs to the mechanical tools. Mechanical tools are located in room 211, so you need to go there.", "positions": [[-33.3, -4.78]]}
I want to go to the office.
{"explanation": "The office is where I work, and it should be at my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-2.32, -4.77]]}
I want to go to the refrigerator to get a bottle of drink.
{"explanation": "There are drinks in the refrigerator, which is located in the kitchen. You need to go there.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67]]}
I want to go to the restroom.
{"explanation": "To go to the restroom, there are two restrooms. One of them is located at [8.64, 3.30]. You can go to either one.", "positions": [[8.64, 3.3]]}
I want to drink water. Can you go to the kitchen and bring me a glass of water?
{"explanation": "You need to go to the kitchen to get a glass, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
Help me get a drone from room 202 and bring it to me.
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 202 to get the drone, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[0.68, -3.25], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
I want to print a document. Can you go to room 203 and get a copy for me?
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 203 to get the document, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-7.84, -4.8], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
I want to drink yogurt. Please bring a bottle of yogurt to me
{"explanation": "Yogurt is located in the kitchen. You need to go to the kitchen to get the yogurt, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-50.63, -2.67], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
Help me find a wrench in room 212 and send it to me.
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 212 to find the wrench, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-33.83, -3.17], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
The computer on my desk is broken. Can you go to room 202 and get a spare computer for me?
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 202 to get a spare computer, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[0.68, -3.25], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
Help me pick up the food delivery downstairs and bring it to me.
{"explanation": "You need to go to the staircase, then go downstairs to pick up the food delivery, and finally return to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[5.48, 2.91], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
The phone on my desk is out of battery. Can you go to the lounge and bring a charger for me?
{"explanation": "You need to go to the lounge to get a charger, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-21.16, 0.65], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
I want to discuss a problem with my senior. He is currently in room 204.
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 204 to find your senior, and then bring him to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-6.39, -3.0], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
I want to have a meeting with my colleagues in the Soft Robotics Lab. Can you help me invite them?
{"explanation": "You need to go to room 205 to find your colleagues, and then bring them to the Soft Robotics Lab in room 205.", "positions": [[-15.69, -4.52], [-15.69, -4.52]]}

{"explanation": "You need to go to room 206 to get the voice recorder, and then bring it to my workstation in room 201.", "positions": [[-13.32, -2.92], [-2.32, -4.77]]}
